name: Games for Stream!
description:
In this unique chat interactive game, your audience matters more than ever! Engage with the action by having your viewers typing commands in the chat, and watch as their decisions directly impact the on-screen gameplay. Will you march on the path to victory or have a wrench thrown in your plans? The choice is up to chat!

But beware, every adventure comes with risks. Viewers responsible might face consequences. It's a high-stakes challenge where skill, strategy, and a bit of mischief collide. Chatters can be timed out, banned, VIP'd and so much more! This game is built around taking your YouTube or Twitch stream to the next level!

Collaborate, compete, and share unforgettable moments together as we push the boundaries of interactive streaming!



The game can be played by audiences of any size! As a streamer, take command and watch your chat have the time of their life right in front of your very eyes!

This game is meant to be a fun experience for both streamers and viewers that would like to more actively participate. The game is very community oriented and is meant to be fun for all.



Features:
  • 🎮 Engaging Gameplay: Type commands in the chat to influence the game in real-time and interact with the streamer on screen.


  • 🔥 Viewer Impact: Your decisions directly affect the outcome, creating a truly interactive experience.

  • ⚔️ High-Stakes: Failure has consequences!
